scriptures.content: When Abram was ninety-nine years old the Lord appeared to Abram and said to him, "I am God Almighty;Hebrew El Shaddai walk before me, and be blameless,
scriptures.section_title: Abraham and the Covenant of Circumcision

scriptures.content: that I may make my covenant between me and you, and <crossref let="o" cid="c01017002.1"/>may multiply you greatly. "
scriptures.section_title: Abraham and the Covenant of Circumcision

scriptures.content: Then Abram <crossref let="p" cid="c01017003.1"/>fell on his face. And God said to him,
scriptures.section_title: Abraham and the Covenant of Circumcision

scriptures.content: "Behold, my covenant is with you, and you shall be <crossref let="q" cid="c01017004.1"/>the father of a multitude of nations.
scriptures.section_title: Abraham and the Covenant of Circumcision

scriptures.content: No longer shall your name be called Abram,Abram means exalted father but your name shall be Abraham,Abraham means father of a multitude for I have made you the father of a multitude of nations.
scriptures.section_title: Abraham and the Covenant of Circumcision

scriptures.content: I will make you exceedingly fruitful, and I will make <crossref let="t" cid="c01017006.1"/>you into nations, and <crossref let="u" cid="c01017006.2"/>kings shall come from you.
scriptures.section_title: Abraham and the Covenant of Circumcision

scriptures.content: And I will <crossref let="v" cid="c01017007.1"/>establish my covenant between me and you and your offspring after you throughout their generations for an everlasting covenant, <crossref let="w" cid="c01017007.2"/>to be God to you and to your offspring after you.
scriptures.section_title: Abraham and the Covenant of Circumcision

scriptures.content: And <crossref let="x" cid="c01017008.1"/>I will give to you and to your offspring after you the land of your sojournings, all the land of Canaan, for an everlasting possession, and <crossref let="y" cid="c01017008.2"/>I will be their God. "
scriptures.section_title: Abraham and the Covenant of Circumcision

scriptures.content: And God said to Abraham, "As for you, you shall keep my covenant, you and your offspring after you throughout their generations.
scriptures.section_title: Abraham and the Covenant of Circumcision

scriptures.content: This is my covenant, which you shall keep, between me and you and your offspring after you: Every male among you shall be circumcised.
scriptures.section_title: Abraham and the Covenant of Circumcision

scriptures.content: You shall be circumcised in the flesh of your foreskins, and it shall be a <crossref let="z" cid="c01017011.1"/>sign of the covenant between me and you.
scriptures.section_title: Abraham and the Covenant of Circumcision

scriptures.content: He who is <crossref let="a" cid="c01017012.1"/>eight days old among you shall be circumcised. Every male throughout your generations, whether born in your house or <crossref let="b" cid="c01017012.2"/>bought with your money from any foreigner who is not of your offspring,
scriptures.section_title: Abraham and the Covenant of Circumcision

scriptures.content: both he who is born in your house and he who is bought with your money, shall surely be circumcised. So shall my covenant be in your flesh an everlasting covenant.
scriptures.section_title: Abraham and the Covenant of Circumcision

scriptures.content: Any uncircumcised male who is not circumcised in the flesh of his foreskin shall be cut off from his people; he has broken my covenant. "
scriptures.section_title: Abraham and the Covenant of Circumcision

scriptures.content: And God said to Abraham, "As for Sarai your wife, you shall not call her name Sarai, but SarahSarai and Sarah mean princess shall be her name.
scriptures.section_title: Isaac's Birth Promised

scriptures.content: I will bless her, and moreover, I will giveHebrew have given you a son by her. I will bless her, and she shall become nations; kings of peoples shall come from her. "
scriptures.section_title: Isaac's Birth Promised

scriptures.content: Then Abraham <crossref let="e" cid="c01017017.1"/>fell on his face <crossref let="f" cid="c01017017.2"/>and laughed and said to himself, "Shall a child be born to a man who is a hundred years old? Shall Sarah, who is ninety years old, bear a child?"
scriptures.section_title: Isaac's Birth Promised

scriptures.content: And Abraham said to God, "Oh that Ishmael might live before you!"
scriptures.section_title: Isaac's Birth Promised

scriptures.content: God said, "No, but Sarah your wife shall bear you a son, and you shall call his name Isaac. Isaac means he laughs I will establish my covenant with him as an everlasting covenant for his offspring after him.
scriptures.section_title: Isaac's Birth Promised

scriptures.content: As for Ishmael, I have heard you; behold, I have blessed him and will make him fruitful and <crossref let="i" cid="c01017020.1"/>multiply him greatly. He <crossref let="j" cid="c01017020.2"/>shall father twelve princes, and <crossref let="k" cid="c01017020.3"/>I will make him into a great nation.
scriptures.section_title: Isaac's Birth Promised

scriptures.content: But <crossref let="l" cid="c01017021.1"/>I will establish my covenant with Isaac, <crossref let="m" cid="c01017021.2"/>whom Sarah shall bear to you at this time next year. "
scriptures.section_title: Isaac's Birth Promised

scriptures.content: When he had finished talking with him, <crossref let="n" cid="c01017022.1"/>God went up from Abraham.
scriptures.section_title: Isaac's Birth Promised

scriptures.content: Then Abraham took Ishmael his son and all those born in his house or bought with his money, every male among the men of Abraham's house, and he circumcised the flesh of their foreskins that very day, as God had said to him.
scriptures.section_title: Isaac's Birth Promised

scriptures.content: Abraham was ninety-nine years old when he was circumcised in the flesh of his foreskin.
scriptures.section_title: Isaac's Birth Promised

scriptures.content: And Ishmael his son was thirteen years old when he was circumcised in the flesh of his foreskin.
scriptures.section_title: Isaac's Birth Promised

scriptures.content: That very day Abraham and his son Ishmael were circumcised.
scriptures.section_title: Isaac's Birth Promised

scriptures.content: And all the men of his house, those born in the house and those bought with money from a foreigner, were circumcised with him. <end-chapter/>
scriptures.section_title: Isaac's Birth Promised
